fullDescription.intro: An embedding layer. Turns positive integers (indexes) into dense vectors of fixed size. This layer can only be used as the first layer behind an input layer in a model. Corresponds to the Embedding Keras layer .
fullDescription.option: Size of the vocabulary, i.e. maximum integer index plus one.
If checked, a bias vector will be used.

ports.inPort: The Keras input layer to which to add an Embedding layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras input layer with an added Embedding layer.
